author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Target Clearance: Ninja Coffee Bar Possibly Only $47.98 (Regularly $159.99) + MORE Kitchen Finds
text:
Target Shoppers! If you are headed to Target, keep your eyes peeled for possible HOT finds in small kitchen appliances and more. Keep in mind clearance items may vary greatly by region. Also, please note that the prices/availability aren’t always accurate, so be sure to scan the item in store to confirm local pricing.
HIP TIP – Before making a special trip, head on over here first and enter your zip code and the DCPI numbers listed below to check stock and price of these items at your local store.
Here are a few of the deals you may be able to score… Ninja Single Serve Coffee Bar System $47.98 (regularly $159.99) 
-DCPI #: 072-08-0290

Vitamix Professional Series $370.30 (regularly $529) 
-DCPI #: 072-04-1318

KitchenAid 4.5 Quart Mixer $164.98 (regularly $329.99) 
-DCPI #: 072-04-0641

Bodum Bistro Toaster $19.98 (regularly $39.99) 
-DCPI #: 072-09-0204

Glass Food Scale $12.98 (regularly $25.99) 
-DCPI #: 070-05-4386

Koji Safari Pops $4.48 (regularly $14.99) 
-DCPI #: 072-04-0486

…And remember , if you’re a Target REDcard holder , you’ll get an additional 5% off your purchases! Hamilton Beach Slow Cooker Possibly Only $44.98 (Regularly $149.99)
